column4: Hey ppl, i had an nvidia graphic card and had the glx drivers, now i changed to ati, and when i boot with ubuntu, the gdm will not start
Is there an xorg generic driver? if so boot with that so you can fix the prob
and change the part that says "nvidia" to vesa
well get vesa first so you can get the ati drivers without hassle
there is but it would be handier to start the xserver and fix the prob using vesa rather than mess around in terminal
ya in vesa, do you no what to do
and you can reconfigure refresh rate while you get the proper drivers
have you installed the nvidia driver?
I dont know the ati well. give me a link to the site you on and I see ca i help ya
